name: Caos Arena
description:
You wake up in front of an Ancient Tomb, you don't know much about yourself but you know you must defend that Tomb at all costs! How long can you resist?

The game is a FPS fantasy, it's inspired from games like skyrim for the style and it wants to be a tower defence where you are the only tower in game, you have to dodge and shoot down the waves of enemies! It's a short game create in one week for an exam, complete of music, UI, sound effects and three types of enemies to fight of

Powered by:

  

Models and Animations from Mixamo.

For contacts you find more on my profile!
